jdbcService.sql: insert into component_attachment ( id, db_created_utc, db_modified_utc, content_types, max_size, min_occurs, max_occurs, role_id, width, height, component_id, attachment_group_id ) values ( :id, timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), :contentTypes, :maxSize, :minOccurs, :maxOccurs, :roleId, :width, :height, :componentId, :attachmentGroupId )
